bibl.title: Grenfell, Hunt, Breccia, and the Book Collections of Oxyrhynchus
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - I. The Archaeology of the finds. - II. The Breccia 1932 concentration: Papyri found in the Kôm Ali el Gamman in 1932; - The contents of the Breccia 1932 concentration; - Dates, scribes, and production; - The character and uses of the collection.
bibl.seg: 160 Breccia Evaristo Grenfell Bernard Pyne Hunt Arthur Surridge 241 Oxyrhynchus 540 810
HOUSTON George W., Grenfell, Hunt, Breccia, and the Book Collections of Oxyrhynchus.

[Introduction.] - I. The Archaeology of the finds. - II. The Breccia 1932 concentration: Papyri found in the Kôm Ali el Gamman in 1932; - The contents of the Breccia 1932 concentration; - Dates, scribes, and production; - The character and uses of the collection.
